jobs.description: Designed, built, and delivered a web app to Evolucion Medica. The app was designed to change the data shown based on the URL, and thus this proyect also needed for the web app to be generic enough to handle all the different enviroments. Clients can use the web app to manage, schedule, and request appointments.
Assisted in teaching programming concepts, complementing the explanations of the lead teacher and providing personalized support to students in solving problems and practical exercises.
Worked on the refactor of BBVA bank's mobile app under Globant's supervision. The refactor was from Polymorph to Lit Element for their mobile app.
Worked on 'Academy' project, an internal management tool, for Globant's DOJO enviroment. I was responsible for UI creation, unit testing, and correct connection with enterprise APIs.
UI development for JPSystem. Web application to control stock and manage customers for businesses, combining entry and search of products by barcode; developed with Next.js, JavaScript and Tailwind.
